Title: The Son Also Rises
Plot: When Baltar's representatives face assassination attempts, Adama asks Lee to protect Baltar's lawyer. After taking on the assignment, Lee seeks to play an active role in Baltar's defense.
GuestStars: Tyler McClendon, Kandyse McClure, Ty Olsson, Don Thompson, Alessandro Juliani, Tahmoh Penikett, Bodie Olmos, Nicki Clyne, Michael Trucco, Mark A. Sheppard
